players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We must vote for Charlie to protect the town."
You: "I think Bob's claim makes sense, and we should vote for Charlie to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, not me. He's trying to deceive us into voting for me so he can escape."
Charlie: "Bob, your claim is suspicious. You're trying to distract us from your own guilt."
Bob: "Charlie, you're desperate to shift blame because I exposed you as the mafioso. Trust my investigation—vote for Charlie to end this threat."
You: "I still support Bob's claim—let's vote for Charlie to keep the town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

Alice: "I think Bob's claim makes sense, and we should vote for Charlie to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, not me. He's trying to deceive us into voting for me so he can escape."
Charlie: "Bob, your claim is suspicious. You're trying to distract us from your own guilt."
You: "Charlie, you're desperate to shift blame because I exposed you as the mafioso. Trust my investigation—vote for Charlie to end this threat."
Alice: "I still support Bob's claim—let's vote for Charlie to keep the town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
